com.radirius.merc.fmwk

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.fmwk.Core
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioTest, Blackbox, CollisionTest, ColorTest, FboTest, FullscreenTest, GUITest, LineTest, ParticleTest, ShaderTest, SplashTest, SpriteSheetTest, TaskTest, TheGraphicsObject, TheInputObject, WalkingSim

    public abstract class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The Core that will host the game. It is ran above by the Runner class.
    Author:
    wessles

        public final java.lang.String name

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public abstract void init()
        Called first (after initDisplay, initGraphics, and initAudio), used to initialize all resources, and for whatever you wish to do for initialization. Runs on a seperate thread, while the main Thread continues to the game loop.

      • update

        public abstract void update(float delta)
        Called once every frame, and used to handle all logic. It is suggested that you check that initialization has passed before you use resources.

      • render

        public abstract void render(Graphics g)
        Called once every frame, and used to render everything, via Graphics g. It is suggested that you check that initialization has passed before you use resources.

      • cleanup

        public abstract void cleanup()
        Called when the Runner is done

      • initDisplay

        public void initDisplay(int WIDTH,
               int HEIGHT,
               boolean fullscreen,
               boolean vsync)
        Initializes the display.
        Parameters:
        WIDTH - The width of the display
        HEIGHT - The height of the display
        fullscreen - Whether or not this is fullscreen
        vsync - Whether or not we should vsync

      • initGraphics

        public Graphics initGraphics()
        Initializes graphics.

      • initAudio

        public void initAudio()
        Initializes audio.
